SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.price), 0) AS price, su.nickname, t.owner_user_id, dept.name AS deptName FROM crm_contract t LEFT JOIN system_users AS su ON su.id = t.owner_user_id LEFT JOIN system_dept AS dept ON dept.id = su.dept_id WHERE t.deleted = 0 AND t.audit_status = 20
and t.owner_user_id in
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'${sqlDateFormat}') between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime} GROUP BY t.owner_user_id ORDER BY price DESC
